title: Black Friday online spending surges as Americans embrace AI to assist with shopping
description: American shoppers turned to artificial intelligence in unprecedented numbers this Black Friday, helping push online spending to a record $11.8 billion.
content:
American shoppers turned to artificial intelligence (AI) in unprecedented numbers this Black Friday, helping push online spending to a record $11.8 billion as many consumers chose to avoid crowded stores and shop from home.

title: Unearthing Ancient Legends: Anand Neelakantan's Bold New Adventure
description: Anand Neelakantan's latest novel, 'Mahishasura: The Legend of Kumarikandam,' is a science-fiction narrative set in 70,000 BC. It merges mythology, history, and futuristic science, exploring themes like artificial intelligence and supreme feminine energy through a gripping storyline involving intergalactic wars and ancient legends.
content: Bestselling author Anand Neelakantan returns with 'Mahishasura: The Legend of Kumarikandam', a novel that creatively reimagines ancient Tamil legends and the Matsya Purana's great flood through a science-fiction lens. Released by Penguin Random House... [763 chars]

title: San Diego universities forge ahead with AI programs
description: San Diego's colleges and universities are offering programs in artificial intelligence to make graduates competitive.
content:
Will the boom in artificial intelligence become as transformative as the internet, or will it go poof in a stock market crash like the dot-com frenzy?
Or is something else far different in store?

title: Breaking the hypnotic spell of misinformation
description: The power of artificial intelligence is further blurring the boundaries of reality and creating a fog of illusion, fraud and lies. Here’s how governments and individuals can fight back
content:
A video began circulating on Facebook shortly before the Irish presidential election in October. It was a report by the national broadcaster, RTÉ, with bombshell news.

title: Mint Explainer: Is Big Tech’s superintelligence narrative inflating the AI bubble?
description: Believers claim some form of artificial general intelligence or superintelligence could emerge by the end of the decade, but critics warn this narrative may be further fuelling an already overheated AI market.
